title: Martin Gray (priest)

sentences.sentence: Martin Clifford Gray (born 19 January 1944) was Archdeacon of Lynn from 1999 to  2009.
Gray was educated at West Ham College of Technology and Westcott House, Cambridge
After an earlier career as a process engineer he was ordained deacon in 1980, and priest in 1981. After a curacy in Kings Lynn he held incumbencies in Sheringham and Lowestoft
This article about a Church of England archdeacon in the Province of Canterbury is a stub
You can help Wikipedia by expanding it
